name: YvsTokenTimelock
description: A token holder contract that will allow a beneficiary to extract the tokens after a given release time. Useful for simple vesting schedules like "advisors get all of their tokens after 1 year".

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Withdrawal is emitted from the local payment storage.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Transfers tokens held by timelock to beneficiary.

returnDecorators.description: the time when the tokens are released.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: set_presale
functionDecorators.description: Set the presale contract for the timelock.

functionDecorators.name: set_token
functionDecorators.description: Set the token held by the timelock.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
